posts.post_content:
Looking for Mint 9 and/or Gem Mint 10 T206's (PSA or SGC). Preferably commons.

Please send PM.

Thanks,
MS

good luck with that. i think there are less then a dozen 10s.

most of the 9s are locked up in peoples collections, so it seems.

certianly an ambitious goal.

kevin

I've owned about six PSA 9's, three SGC 96's, and one PSA 10. They're out there, just takes some cash or good trade bait to loosen out of hands. I'm just looking for a few again for my collection, not trying to put the whole set together in mint condition. ;)

gotcha.

the only 10 i saw caminitz on ebay with BIN for 10k.

regretting not buying that as we speak.

kevin

Dont beat yourself up, that Camnitz on ebay was a scam (assuming you mean 2-3 years ago?). I know the owner very well and contacted him when it popped up on ebay. It has resided in a well-known collection for over 10+ years.

gotcha.

didn't look at it that closely but the image looked good if i recall correctly.

i presume that it was a listing of someone elses card?

kevin

The scans were lifted from on old Mastros Auction catalog I believe. I wish I got the card originally from Mastro's, went for around $5k i think.

I'll send you a PM to discuss further.
